description: I'm software developer specializing in React.js and Next.js, with extensive experience in startup environments. I excel at building 0-to-1 applications, transforming ideas into visually appealing, user centric, &  high-performance products.

rentvest.label: Rent Vest
rentvest.about: Real Estate Platform for Rent to Own
rentvest.description: Co-founded a game-changing real estate platform that's making homeownership dreams come true. As Lead Technical Product Engineer, I'm crafting an AI-powered platform that turns the complex rent-to-own process into a seamless journey. We're revolutionizing how people transition from renting to owning, one property at a time.

celebrate.label: Celebrate Life
celebrate.description: As a full-time frontend developer, I led the development of an innovative digital platform that revolutionizes how people commemorate and share life's meaningful moments. Built with cutting-edge technology, this app combines event planning with digital storytelling, offering a seamless experience for creating, organizing, and preserving cherished memories. Features include interactive timelines, collaborative event planning, and AI-powered memory suggestions.

vest.label: Vest Exchange Clone
vest.description: Challenged myself to recreate Vest Exchange's crypto trading platform from scratch. Built a clone to showcase technical skills.

stealth.label: Stealth
stealth.description: Architected and launched a high-performance content platform that revolutionized digital content curation. Built with modern tech stack and optimized for exceptional performance, the platform attracted 800,000+ global users with its unique art-inspired interface and seamless user experience. From concept to acquisition, this project combined cutting-edge technology with artistic vision, creating a space where content meets creativity. Successfully monetized through strategic partnerships and innovative advertising solutions, setting new standards in content platform design. A journey from idea to exit that proved innovation and user-centric design can transform the digital landscape! ðŸš€

enrolld.label: Enrolld
enrolld.description: Revolutionized college course registration with an AI-powered platform that makes enrollment as easy as online shopping. Built smart features that help students plan their academic journey while giving staff powerful tools to manage course offerings. A game-changer for over 5,000 students!

portfolio.label: IZ | Engineer
portfolio.description: My digital playground where code meets creativity! This portfolio showcases my journey as a developer through interactive designs and smooth animations. Built with love in both English and Chinese, it's my way of saying 'Hello World' to future collaborators.

ecapital.label: eCapital
ecapital.description: Transformed a Manhattan investment firm's digital presence with a sleek, modern website. Made complex financial services feel approachable through clean design and intuitive navigation. Because smart investments deserve smart design!

cag.label: CAG
cag.description: My first dive into web design during college! Created a fun, fictional accounting firm website to explore the basics of web development. Played around with layouts, animations, and user flows - because even practice projects deserve some style. Hey, everyone starts somewhere! ðŸš€
